resources.string: Mobile Tech for Seniors and their Families

By creating an account, you agree to
Mind Your Loved OnesTM (“MYLOTM”)
PRIVACY- This App is Native to Your Phone. This means all information resides on your smartphone and NOT on our server. We do not transmit or receive data between your phone and our server.

PRIVACY- MYLO only has access to your name and email. It does NOT have access or store any other information you input into this app.Allowing the App (“MYLO”) to access your photos, media, and files or to make and mange phone calls provides the USER with functionality and a good mobile experience. OUR COMPANY DOES NOT HAVE ACCESS TO YOUR INFORMATION. WE DO NOT TRANSMIT OR RECEIVE DATA BETWEEN YOUR PHONE AND OUR SERVER.

This App will ask you for permission to access your photos, media and files or to make phone calls. This is simply to provide the User with functionality for a good mobile experience. We do not have access to this information.

USERS must remember their user name and email address and should save data once populated. Instructions are included in app. Fax capability is ONLY to be used for medical emergencies to satisfy HIPAA requirements.
Step 3. Add as much or as little information as you want.

Step 1. To add a Profile click the plus box. You will see two options : Create New and Import From Dropbox

Step 2.
  •  Create New : You will be brought to the Personal Information Screen. If the person is in your Contacts then click the gray bar on the top right side of your screen to load information.
  •  Import From Dropbox : Using this feature you can restore the previous profile from your Dropbox.
Step 4. When completed click on the green bar at the bottom of the screen that says Add Profile

Step 5. TO SHARE A PROFILE. Long press on the profile box.

Step 6. TO DELETE A PROFILE. Long press on the profile box.

2.	If You are the Person Receiving the
		Database or a particular Profile from
		Another Person this is how you upload 
		the Profile into your App.

resources.string: Important Note: MYLO uses the functionality of Dropbox to allow its Users to backup, restore, share all Profiles or just one Profile.\n
